MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_SMECNS
MODULE.description:
Single-mic ECNS in the voice processor on the Tx path.
This module supports the following#[ #] parameter IDs 
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS (supported only for backward#[ #] compatibility)
VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_PRESET
VOICE_PARAM_AF_COEFFS
VOICE_PARAM_FNS
VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_EXT

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS
PARAMETER.description:
Single-mic ECNS.
Maximum array size for this parameter 
Version 0 â€“ 92#[ #] bytes 
Note Single-mic ECNS also supports a versioned command, VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_EXT.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Mode#[ #] word controls the activation of various blocks of EC

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tuning_mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Speech frame can be replaced by 1 kHz sinusoidal frame depending on the internal status of EEC set by tuning_mode

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: HPF_coeffs
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Determines high pass filter. No adjustments should be made.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_limit
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Saturator for the#[ #] echo reference.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: echo_path_delay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Compensates#[ #] the fixed delay in echo path

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: output_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Output gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: input_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Input gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_twoalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Step size to#[ #] update the coefficients of AF

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_erl
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Adaptive step size#[ #] control for AF filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_taps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of taps of AF#[ #] foreground filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_preset_coefs
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Indicates whether#[ #] a preset of AF coefficients should be done

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_offset
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum power#[ #] level used in computation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_erl_bg
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Adaptive step size#[ #] control for AF background filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_taps_bg
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of taps of AF#[ #] background filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PCD_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls#[ #] sensitivity to detect of path changes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: minimum_erl
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum adaptive#[ #] step size

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: SPDET_xclip
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls the#[ #] activation of nonlinear echo suppression.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_tail_alpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Represents#[ #] decay time in energy of echo tail of impulse response.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_tail_portion
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Represents#[ #] the level of the echo tail present in power estimated by AF filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_gamma_e_high
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Additional#[ #] muting gain applied in DES during far-end only.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_gamma_e_dt
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Additional#[ #] muting gain applied in DES during doubletalk.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_limit_NS
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls the#[ #] maximum amount of noise suppression.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_NL_atten
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls the#[ #] amount of nonlinear echo suppression.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: WB_gamma_n
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Oversubtraction#[ #] factor and bias compensation for noise estimation. Used with DENS_limit_NS.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: WB_gamma_e
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: This parameter#[ #] adjusts the aggressiveness of EC in the high band (4 ~ 8 kHz). A higher value is more aggressive and suppresses more high-band echo.Q-format -#[ #] Q4.11WB_gamma_E = 2048 * gammaWhere gamma is in the range [0,15]

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this param to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this param to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_PRESET
PARAMETER.description:
SMECNS preset coefficients for single-mic ECNS. Maximum array size#[ #] for this parameter
Version 0 â€“ 1604 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: NumPresetFilterTaps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of taps of AF foreground filter for highband

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PresetFilterCoeffs
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of preset coefficients

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_AF_COEFFS
PARAMETER.description:
Returns the Adaptive Filter (AF) coefficients of the currently#[ #] configured echo canceler. This parameter is read only.
 
AFCoeffData data structures.
AFCoeffData is defined in the following topology AF data#[ #] structure tables and is based on the voice processing topology. The structure length is variable based on the number of taps the module uses at the#[ #] time of the query.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Voice_processing_topology
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description:
Topology ID that defines the mode of echo cancellation.
 Supported topology IDs 
 VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_SM_ECNS#[ #] Single mic ECNS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: NumAFTaps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of taps.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AFCoeffs
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of AF coefficients.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_FNS
PARAMETER.description:
FNS algorithm.
Fixed size for this parameter 
Version 0 - 76 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsMode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Mode for#[ #] enabling/disabling submodules

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsInputGain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Input gain to#[ #] FENS module

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsTargetNS
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Target noise#[ #] suppression level in dB

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction#[ #] factor for stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction#[ #] factor for nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNalphaMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] over-subtraction factor for nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsEalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Scaling factor for#[ #] excess noise suppression

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNSNRmax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Upper bound in#[ #] dB for SNR estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSNblock
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Quarter block size#[ #] for stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNi
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Initialization block#[ #] size for nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNPscale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Power scale#[ #] factor for nonstationary noise update

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNLambda
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing factor#[ #] for nonstationary noise update

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNLambdaf
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] factor for higher level nonstationary noise update

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsBias
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Bias factor in dB#[ #] for gain calculation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SNR lower bound in#[ #] dB for aggressive gain calculation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSalphaHB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction factor for high-band stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNalphaMaxHB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] over-subtraction factor for high-band nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsEalphaHB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Scaling factor for#[ #] high-band excess noise suppression

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNLambda0
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] factor for nonstationary noise update during speech activity

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsFast
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Fast smoothing#[ #] factor for postprocessor gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsMed
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Medium smoothing#[ #] factor for postprocessor gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsSlow
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Slow smoothing#[ #] factor for postprocessor gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSwbNalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction#[ #] factor for super wide band stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold for#[ #] generating a binary VAD decision

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pwrScale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Indirectly#[ #] lower-bounds the noise level estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: hangoverMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Avoids mid-speech#[ #] clipping and reliably detects weak speech bursts at the end of speech activity

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alphaSNR
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls#[ #] responsiveness of the VAD

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: snrDiffMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Decreasing this#[ #] parameter value may help in making correct decisions during abrupt changes; however, decreasing too much may increase false alarms during long#[ #] pauses/silences

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: snrDiffMin
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Decreasing this#[ #] parameter value may help in making correct decisions during abrupt changes; however, decreasing too much may increase false alarms during long#[ #] pauses/silences

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: initLength
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the number#[ #] of frames for which noise level estimate is set to a fixed value

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: maxVal
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the upper#[ #] limit of the noise level

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: initBound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the initial#[ #] bounding value for the noise level estimate; used during the initial segment defined by the parameter initLength

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: resetBound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Reset bound for#[ #] noise tracking

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: avarScale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the bias#[ #] factor in noise estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sub_Nc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the window#[ #] length for noise estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spowMin
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the minimum#[ #] signal power required to update the bounds for the noise floor estimate

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_EXT
PARAMETER.description:
Single-mic ECNS with versioning.
Maximum array size for this#[ #] parameter 
Version 0 â€“ 96 bytes 
Version 1 extension â€“ 112 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Mode#[ #] word controls the activation of various blocks of EC

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tuning_mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Speech frame can be replaced by 1 kHz sinusoidal frame depending on the internal status of EEC set by tuning_mode

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: HPF_coeffs
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Determines high pass filter. No adjustments should be made.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_limit
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Saturator for the#[ #] echo reference.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: echo_path_delay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Compensates#[ #] the fixed delay in echo path

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: output_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Output gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: input_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Input gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_twoalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Step size to#[ #] update the coefficients of AF

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_erl
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Adaptive step size#[ #] control for AF filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_taps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of taps of AF#[ #] foreground filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_preset_coefs
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Indicates whether#[ #] a preset of AF coefficients should be done

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_offset
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum power#[ #] level used in computation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_erl_bg
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Adaptive step size#[ #] control for AF background filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AF_taps_bg
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of taps of AF#[ #] background filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PCD_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls#[ #] sensitivity to detect of path changes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: minimum_erl
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum adaptive#[ #] step size

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: SPDET_xclip
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls the#[ #] activation of nonlinear echo suppression.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_tail_alpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Represents#[ #] decay time in energy of echo tail of impulse response.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_tail_portion
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Represents#[ #] the level of the echo tail present in power estimated by AF filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_gamma_e_high
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Additional#[ #] muting gain applied in DES during far-end only.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_gamma_e_dt
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Additional#[ #] muting gain applied in DES during doubletalk.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_gamma_n
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Oversubtraction#[ #] factor and bias compensation for noise estimation. Used with DENS_limit_NS.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_limit_NS
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls the#[ #] maximum amount of noise suppression.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DENS_NL_atten
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls the#[ #] amount of nonlinear echo suppression.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: WB_gamma_n
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Oversubtraction#[ #] factor and bias compensation for high band noise estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: WB_gamma_e
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: This parameter#[ #] adjusts the aggressiveness of EC in the high band (4 ~ 8 kHz). A higher value is more aggressive and suppresses more high-band echo.Q-format -#[ #] Q4.11WB_gamma_E = 2048 * gammaWhere gamma is in the range [0,15]

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: WB_tail_alpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Represents decay time in energy of echo tail of impulse response for highband.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: WB_tail_portion
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Represents the level of the echo tail present in power estimated by AF filter for highband.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this to zero.
